MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G82 postcode area of Dumbarton, affecting properties in Garshake Avenue and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault near to Garshake Terrace Substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:38 PM on Thursday, 04 February 2021
